table.caption: Description of ML2 Geneve type driver configuration options

tr.td: (IntOpt) Geneve encapsulation header size is dynamic, this value is used to calculate the maximum MTU for the driver.this is the sum of the sizes of the outer ETH + IP + UDP + GENEVE header sizes
(ListOpt) Comma-separated list of <vni_min>:<vni_max> tuples enumerating ranges of Geneve VNI IDs that are available for tenant network allocation
